dict.acceptation: 逃脱；（气体，液体等）漏出；（未受伤或只受了一点伤害而）逃脱；声音（不自觉地）由…发出；
逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏；

sent.orig: Press the ESCAPE key to close the game window and get back into the editor.
sent.trans: 按ESCAPE键关闭游戏窗口回到编辑器界面。

sent.orig: Pressing escape keeps the splitter bar in their original location.
sent.trans: 按escape以使分割条保持在其原来的位置上。

sent.orig: The character an escape character represents the start of an ASCII escape character.
sent.trans: 前跟转义字符用于标识ASCII转义字符开始的字符。

sent.orig: When the escape tower is activated, the wings will unfold, helping escape craft to fly stably.
sent.trans: 例句逃逸塔启动的时候能够使飞船双翼打开并且平稳飞行。

sent.orig: Escape through the Sewers|+|+Infiltrate the Sewers, rendezvous with Colonel Harding and then escape Colditz castle.
sent.trans: 从下水道脱逃。|+|+潜入下水道，跟哈定上校约见面，然后逃出寇地兹堡垒。
